channel.title: NPC Second and Third Option [508] edited paladino's source
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I was busy making an second and third npc options working but the problem is that the npcid(aka p.clickid) is bigger then Engine.npcs.length. this is actualy the formule : 22656 >= 5000
How can i fix? if i remove that filter it makes the client crash :o
